page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA
page.content: At between 6 am and 7 am I wake up.I then get dressed and washed. Next I brush my hair and I go and have my breakfast.Then I generally mess about until 8.25 am. I then find my shoes, coat and schoolbag.After that I go down the road to call for my friend.We then go up the road to call for my other friend.When she is ready we walk to school.Once we're in school we usually do Maths and English and sometimes we go into the hall for Assembly.At 10.30 am we have play-time which lasts for a quarter hour and at 12.00 pm it is dinner-time.Once we've had dinner we play 'till l.l5 pm.Then we do some more work and at 3.l5 pm it is home-time. At home at 4.15 pm we usually have tea then I watch the television until 9.00 pm when I get changed, brush my teeth and go to bed.
